did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Cornell University College of Architecture, Art, and Planning College of Alumni Assembly and Retrospective tape recordings, 1977.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. College of Architecture, Art, and Planning. College Alumni Assembly and Retrospective

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Seven tape recordings of a program at the Cornell College of Architecture, Art, and Planning, September 30-November 1, 1977, including presentations by students; reminiscences of alumni Robert Alexander, Edmund Bacon, and Henri Jova, chaired by Harry Wade; addresses by Jason Seley, Donald Greenberg, Frank Rhodes, and Nathaniel A. Owings; College Advisory Council and Alumni Assembly meetings; and reunion interviews.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Seven tape recordings of a program at the Cornell College of Architecture, Art, and Planning, September 30-November 1, 1977, including presentations by students; reminiscences of alumni Robert Alexander (Class of 1930), Edmund Bacon (1932), and Henri Jova (1941), chaired by Harry Wade (1927); addresses by Jason Seley, Donald Greenberg, Frank Rhodes, and Nathaniel A. Owings; College Advisory Council and Alumni Assembly meetings; and reunion interviews.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell University. College of Architecture, Art, and Planning. College Alumni Assembly and Retrospective tape recordings, #15-1-1804. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
